title: Ep260 Handwriting Analysis
description:
This week, the gals pull out their favorite pens to look at the hidden signs behind their signatures. Topics include an intimate reading, a green pen red herring, and some mysterious French postcards. Pop open a bottle of Slo Down Wines' Send Nudes Rosé, get a typewriter, and tune in for Handwriting Analysis.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit:
https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
